page.title: 14MY LAST YEAR AT SAINT JOSEPH
page.content: I enjoyed every year at st joseph,s primary school in the fourth year.I had alot of fun then with my friends and teachers.Although we did alot of work, there were many privileges.my favourites were when i went on school journey and had our leavers party.In the third and fourth year each class goes on school journey. the prices are very reasonable, and the teachers do lot of organisation for the trips.I especially liked the trip to weston- super-mare where we stayed in a hotel by the beach.Every day we went out and the teachers always supervised us.Even when our class got prizes for certain achievements.The leavers party was also a great success.We had a disco and all our families were invited.Our head made made a speech showing her appreciation.
